ovdesc.p: The application EB.SYSTEM.ID is used to provide a description of the SYSTEM.ID field in the accounting entry files, STMT.ENTRY, CATEG.ENTRY, CONSOL.NET.TODAY and RE.CONSOL.SPEC.ENTRY.

The application also holds additional details of the underlying application record which was responsible for raising the entries. This may then be used to allow the correct drill-down in entry based enquiries.

p.p: Identifies any additional element which has been defined locally to meet a particular requirement.

If this Helptext is visible then it means that the LOCAL.REF field for this application has not been activated. This field is a link into the LOCAL.TABLE and LOCAL.REF.TABLE core applications. When these are set correctly, then this field will be replaced by one or more fields as defined by the user. The field names will be added to the applications STANDARD.SELECTION record, as user type fields, and can be used for Enquiries, Versions, reporting etc.
